title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets: Successful Interception and Air Assault in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF targeted a military structure where Hezbollah operatives were active; air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspicious aerial target that crossed from Lebanese territory.

Combat aircraft attacked two Hezbollah operatives a short while ago who were operating in a military structure of the organization in the area of Bleda in southern Lebanon.

The operatives were attacked shortly after being identified by a force from Division 91 in the area from which launches were carried out today towards the Ramim ridge.

Earlier today, air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspicious aerial target that crossed from Lebanon into northern Golan Heights. Alerts were activated in the area according to policy.

Firefighting forces are currently working at the scene to extinguish a fire that broke out as a result of debris from the interception; there are no casualties.

Attached is documentation of the identification of the operatives and their attack: https://bit.ly/3YvkwO6
